name: Weaver
slogan: Connecting Architects and Builders like never before
description:
Weaver is a revolutionary platform for architects that digitises the early stages of project lifecycle. We’ve started off by redefining how to vet builders, systemising the process of obtaining quotations and simplified cost reviewing. Today, hundreds of construction professionals are dependent on us, allowing them to get back to doing what they do best.

What’s next? Backed by venture capital, we’re growing quickly and need to create something special so that the market at large can enter the digital age. We’re off to a strong start, but we have a lot of work to do. Sound like your kind of challenge? We’d love to hear from you!

team.title: COO
team.name: Linden Dover
team.bioHtml: Co-Founded @Weaver; Co-Founded @Phosphorus, residential development co. Built early asset management & BD lead @onefinestay. Qualified Construction Manager

team.title: CEO
team.name: Gregory Keane
team.bioHtml: Co-Founded @Weaver ; Co-Founded @Kitesgrove, an Architectural Interiors Practice; Qualified @Surveyor; Qualified @Accountant @Pricewaterhouse Coopers (PwC)

team.title: Customer SuccessLead
team.name: Evelyne Hibbert
team.bioHtml: BA Chinese graduate with a 2:1 honours degree looking to build a career in EdTech. I have experience in social media, client engagement and marketing.

jobs.title: Customer Success Intern
jobs.description:
Weaver is setting new standards of trust in construction with a platform that promotes accountability, provides cost transparency and increases build performance. Instead of using old-school processes, architects and builders alike come to Weaver to solve some of their biggest headaches.

We’ve started off by redefining how to vet builders, systemising the process of obtaining quotations and simplified cost reviewing. Today, hundreds of construction professionals are dependent on us, allowing them to go back to doing what they do best.

What’s next? Backed by venture capital, we’re growing quickly and need to create the appropriate systems for scale so that the market at large can change behaviour and enter the digital age. We’re off to a strong start, but we have a lot of work to do. Sound like your kind of challenge? We’d love to hear from you!

WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING
- Managing live orders from start to finish
- Analysing quotations in order to create reports for users
- Vetting builders and the on-boarding journey
- Answer in-bound builder calls
- Understanding how our business objectives impact your work
- Getting involved with other projects that excite you
- Working closely with the founders

WHAT SKILLS YOU'LL NEED
- Graduated with at least a 2:1 from a top university
-  Excellent written and verbal English
- A great communicator with the confidence to sell to people (persistent!)
- A keen eye for detail
- An ability to be self sufficient and learn quickly
- Strong organisational and time-management skills
- Extra credits for experience in property/construction, startups, customer success or sales

WHAT YOU’LL GET
- Opportunity to work closely with Founders
- Competitive compensation
- ClassPass monthly credits
- Team meals
- Amazon voucher rewards for targets reached
- Startup office amenities

jobs.title: Sales Intern
jobs.description:
Weaver is setting new standards of trust in construction with a platform that promotes accountability, provides cost transparency and increases build performance. Instead of using old-school processes, architects and builders alike come to Weaver to solve some of their biggest headaches.

We’ve started off by redefining how to vet builders, systemising the process of obtaining quotations and simplified cost reviewing. Today, hundreds of construction professionals are dependent on us, allowing them to go back to doing what they do best.

What’s next? Backed by venture capital, we’re growing quickly and need to create the appropriate systems for scale so that the market at large can change behaviour and enter the digital age. We’re off to a strong start, but we have a lot of work to do. Sound like your kind of challenge? We’d love to hear from you!

WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING
- Manage a sales pipeline from start to finish
- Arrange & attend events in architect studios
- Support vetting of builders by carrying out reference calls
- Understanding how our business objectives impact your work
- Getting involved with other projects that excite you
- Working closely with the founders

WHAT SKILLS YOU'LL NEED
- Graduated with at least a 2:1 from a top university
- Excellent written and verbal English
- A great communicator with the confidence to sell to people (persistent!)
- A keen eye for detail
- An ability to be self sufficient and learn quickly
- Strong organisational and time-management skills
- Extra credits for experience in property/construction, startups, customer success or sales

WHAT YOU’LL GET
- Opportunity to work closely with Founders
- Competitive compensation
- ClassPass monthly credits
- Team meals
- Amazon voucher rewards for targets reached
- Startup office amenities
